properties.NAME: Mahatma Gandhi Stadium
properties.DESCRIPTION: The stadium has hosted seven first-class matches from 1973 when Tamil Nadu cricket team played against Kerala cricket team. The ground hosted its last first-class matches in 1992 when Tamil Nadu cricket team played against Andhra cricket team.
properties.ADDRESS: Omalur Main Rd, Sankar Nagar, Salem, Tamil Nadu-636007

properties.NAME: Chemplast Cricket Ground
properties.DESCRIPTION: Chemplast Cricket Ground or Indian Institute of Technology Chemplast Ground is a cricket ground in the IIT Madras campus. The ground is an important cricket venue and is described by cricketer Sachin Tendulkar as the most scenic in the country. It is set amongst greenery
properties.ADDRESS: Indian Institute Of Technology, Chennai, Tamil Nadu - 600036

properties.NAME: NPR College Cricket Ground
properties.DESCRIPTION: An artificial turf ground with a seating capacity of 5000 and flood lights. The ground has hosted 10 first class cricket matches and it is also a venue for Tamil Nadu Premier League tournament.

properties.NAME: Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium
properties.DESCRIPTION: Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium is a multipurpose stadium in Chennai, India. It has a capacity to seat 40,000 people. It hosts football matches and athletic competitions. The complex also houses a multipurpose indoor stadium with a seating capacity of 5,000 which hosts volleyball, basketball, table tennis games.
properties.ADDRESS: Raja Muthiah Rd, Kannappar Thidal, Periyamet, Chennai, Tamil Nadu - 600003

properties.NAME: M.A.Chidambaram Stadium
properties.DESCRIPTION: M. A. Chidambaram Stadium is a cricket stadium in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. It was established in 1916 and it is the second oldest cricket stadium in the country after Eden Gardens in Kolkata.
properties.ADDRESS: Victoria Hostel Rd, Chepauk, Triplicane, Chennai, Tamil Nadu - 600005
